tool_description: Checks real-time inventory levels across all warehouses for requested products and quantities.

product_skus.description: List of product SKUs to check

warehouse_ids.description: Specific warehouses to check, if empty checks all

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved inventory in calculations

error_messages: Invalid SKU format: All SKUs must be valid alphanumeric product identifiers.
Quantity mismatch: Number of quantities must match number of SKUs.
Invalid quantity: All quantities must be positive integers.
Warehouse not found: One or more warehouse IDs are invalid.
Inventory system unavailable: Unable to connect to inventory management system.
usage: Provide product_skus and corresponding quantities arrays. Optionally specify warehouse_ids to limit search scope and include_reserved to include reserved stock.

availability_status.description: Overall availability: available, partial, or unavailable

warehouse_stock.description: Stock levels by warehouse in format 'warehouse_id:sku:available_quantity'

shortfall_items.description: SKUs that don't have sufficient inventory

total_available_units.description: Total units available across all warehouses
